title: Saraswati Puja - Latest News on Saraswati Puja
title_page: Saraswati Puja - Latest News on Saraswati Puja | Read Breaking News on Zee News
text: One of the accused in the killing of Arup Bhandari, who protested against eve-teasing during immersion of Saraswati idols, was arrested on Thursday from Uttar Pradesh, a day after Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee expressed her annoyance over police failure to book the culprits.
